public ref class QuicException sealed : System::IO::IOException

Docs.summary: The exception that is thrown when a QUIC error occurs.

Docs.param: The error associated with the exception.
The application protocol error code associated with the error.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ApplicationErrorCode As Nullable(Of Long)
public: property Nullable<long> ApplicationErrorCode { Nullable<long> get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the application protocol error code associated with the error.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
This property contains the error code set by the application layer when closing the connection (<xref:System.Net.Quic.QuicError.ConnectionAborted>) or closing a read or write direction of a QUIC stream (<xref:System.Net.Quic.QuicError.StreamAborted>). Its value is `null` for all other errors.

Docs.summary: Gets the error that's associated with this exception.
